name: Sun Domain Showdown
description: An action combat game that takes you through waves of enemies for you to cut down in an Aztec temple. Get up close and personal with hordes of temple fighters and also dodge magic bullets that get thrown at you. See how far you can make it.

name: Honed By Stone
description: A very basic endless runner game. Dodge and slash your way past the flying rocks and try to score as high as you can. This is a project game. Please feel free to leave any type of feedback, positive or negative. Either way, you will be helping me in my future game projects.

name: Anomaly
description: Anomaly is an arcade survival game where you must avoid being destroyed all while destroying enemies that charge and shoot at you. Survive longer to improve your high score.
